docs.title: About me
docs.text:
In this section, I write about myself.

This section will be updated regularly throughout my life.

docs.title: About Synapse
docs.text:
Synapse is my second brain. My productivity system. My knowledge hub.

This website is only one part of Synapse.

docs.title: Projects
docs.text:
Welcome to my projects page. Here I keep the documentation of my personal projects.

These are the projects I am currently working on:

  • Synapse
  • Personal finance app

I also keep track of the projects I still want to complete:

  • TBC

docs.title: Finance Project
docs.text: Welcome to the documentation site of my personal finance project. In this project I want to create a automation flow to handle my personal finances. The end goal is to have a personal finance dashboard where I can see my cash flow and net worth, all by using as little effort as possible to maintain.

docs.title: Database Structure
docs.text: This is the ERD diagram of the finance database:

docs.title: SQLmanager
docs.text: The SQLManager class in SQLmanager.py is responsible for managing the connection to a PostgreSQL database and executing SQL queries.

docs.title: Input
docs.text: The GmailAPI class in input.py is responsible for authenticating with the Gmail API and fetching CSV attachments from emails. This is used to get the KBC statements from my gmail account larsbaert05@gmail.com

docs.title: Main
docs.text: The main.py file is the entry point for the application. It orchestrates the interaction between the GmailAPI and SQLManager classes.

docs.title: Setup of Synapse
docs.text:
